OOC: Damn. I got toys so embarrassingly old stashed away in the attic, and =
I haven't played with them for years. Potato Head Kids, anyone?...

  -----=
 Original Message ----- 
  From: KSLawdogg@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, July 17, 2001 6:59 PM
  Subject: Shockwave & Subordi=
nates


  (I had Bucky O'Hare, that dumb kid in the monkey suit, Deadeye, T=
oad Borg, 
  the dog dude that Bucky worked for, the Toad General dude, and=
 the Toad 
  Fighter, but my dad made me give away the Toad Fighter for a s=
chool 
  fundraiser because I "never" played with it)

  Shockwave/Unitron/=
Firestarter/Sixshot:




  Shockwave, despite his best efforts, was struck =
in his frame by five shots, 
  almost unnoticably decreasing his speed.  He=
 launched two missiles, each 
  splitting apart, one heading for Termitron =
the other for Windlord.

  Unitron wasn't so lucky, although he was going f=
ull speed at 54 MPH he was 
  only able to dodge a few shots and a missile,=
 the other missile blowing up 
  against the armor plating in front of his =
treads, causing a huge dent and 
  slowing him down a few more MPH.  The fi=
ve shots dug into his armor, causing 
  dents but nothing to serious.

  "A=
fts!" he yelled, his cannon swerving quickly on his turret, launching two 
=
  explosive shells (from a tank, so they're not bullets) at Hot Rod.

  ---=


  Firestarter saw the battle several cycles after crossing the Pacific Oc=
ean 
  and passing across some land, hovering several hundred feet above gr=
ound in 
  his biped mode.  "Looks like they're holding their own."

  "So?=
  Let's kick tailgate!" Sixshot yelled, divebombing and launching off two 
=
  missiles, both at Aerotaur.

  "Good enough for me!" Firestarter called o=
ut after, following the space 
  fighter, transforming to his own space fig=
hter mode and firing off twenty 
  rapid laser blasts from his nosecone, te=
n at Cledar and ten at Forrior.

   

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subjec=
t to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
